changeSet.author: Maeis Gharibjanian
changeSet.comment: Increasing the size of the password column. This should be enough to store most hashes generated from known hashing methods plus the generated salt.

changeSet.author: Khurram M Cheema
changeSet.comment: Adding a column to represent the encryption scheme. Here we are assuming that all clients are sticking to the default password hashing method which is MD5.

changeSet.author: Vladimir Carevski
changeSet.comment: It changes the hashed value of all test users to match the one from BCrypt

changeSet.author: Bilal Shah
changeSet.comment: Constant ID may need to be changed during merging of this feature to later branches to avoid overlapping with other preference IDs

column.name: content
column.value: Number of minutes a User's account will remain locked after the number of allowed retries (Preference 39) are exhausted.

column.name: content
column.value: The number of retries to allow before locking the user account. A locked user account will be locked for the amount of minutes specified in Preference 68. To enable this locking feature, setting Preference 68 to a non-zero value is a must.

update.where: table_id = 50 and foreign_id = 39 and language_id = 1 and psudo_column = 'instruction'

column.name: content
column.value: A failed login attempt was made.

changeSet.comment: October 28, 2014 - #9223: Use ITG in all the application where an invoice is generate into PDF.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter(id, task_id, name, int_value, str_value, float_value, optlock) SELECT max(ptp.id) + 100 + pt.entity_id, pt.id, 'template', null, pt.entity_id, null, 1 FROM pluggable_task_parameter ptp INNER JOIN pluggable_task pt ON pt.id = ptp.task_id INNER JOIN pluggable_task_type ptt ON ptt.id = pt.type_id WHERE ptt.class_name = 'com.sapienter.jbilling.server.pluggableTask.PaperInvoiceNotificationTask' group by pt.id;

changeSet.author: Morales Fernando G.
changeSet.comment: Adding reservation parameter
Asset reservation table
Adding indexes

changeSet.author: Prashant Gupta
changeSet.comment: move existing templateJson to newly created invoice_template_version and set pk generator sequence appropriately
changeSet.sql: insert into invoice_template_version (id, template_id, created_datetime, version_number, tag_name, template_json) ( select id, id, now(), (id+0.1), null, template_json from invoice_template )
update jbilling_seqs set next_id = coalesce((select max(t.id)+1 from invoice_template_version t),1) where name = 'invoice_template_version'
changeSet.comment: drop column template_json from invoice_template table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE invoice_template DROP COLUMN template_json

changeSet.author: Vladimir Carevski
changeSet.comment: #10344 Implementing the asset assignment feature
changeSet.sql:
insert into asset_assignment (id, asset_id, order_line_id, start_datetime)
(select a.id, a.id, a.order_line_id, ooc.application_date from asset a inner join order_line ol on a.order_line_id = ol.id inner join order_change ooc on ooc.order_line_id = ol.id where a.order_line_id is not null and ooc.id = ( select oc.id from order_change oc inner join order_change_asset_map ocam on ocam.order_change_id = oc.id where oc.order_line_id = ol.id and ocam.asset_id = a.id order by oc.application_date desc limit 1));

changeSet.author: Vojislav Stanojevikj
changeSet.comment: Rename all existing strategy_type cells in price_model table, from FLAT to ZERO and from METERED to FLAT.

changeSet.author: Aadil Nazir
changeSet.comment: #11369 Develop ability to identify inactive accounts
Added new column in base_user, value is set to date on which a user is marked in-active
Add new preference of Number of days after which a User's account will become inactive
Constant ID may need to be changed during merging of this feature to later branches to avoid overlapping with other preference IDs
foreign_id may need to be changed depending upon preference ID assigned above during merging to later branches
foreign_id may need to be changed depending upon preference ID assigned above during merging to later branches

column.name: content
column.value: Number of days after which a User's account will become inactive. This will disable the ability to login to jBilling for that user.

changeSet.comment: Add new plug-in to make users inactive if they are not logged-in for number of days specified in the preference created above
Constant ID may need to be changed during merging of this feature to later branches to avoid overlapping with other plug-ins
foreign_id may need to be changed depending upon plug-in ID assigned above during merging to later branches
foreign_id may need to be changed depending upon plug-in ID assigned above during merging to later branches

column.name: content
column.value: This is a scheduled plugin that takes in user that has not been logged-in for number of days specified in preference 55 and update there status to Inactive.

Hello $first_name $last_name,

$newPasswordLink

changeSet.author: Ravi Singhal
changeSet.comment: Hide Permission: Password Override

column.name: content
column.value:
Hello $first_name $last_name,

You (or someone pretending to be you) requested a password reset of your account.

You may reset your password from the following link:

$newPasswordLink

Admin:	$organization_name

update.where:
content = 'Hello $first_name $last_name, You (or someone pretending to be you) requested a password reset of your account. If you access the following link your password will be changed to: $newPassword $newPasswordLink' or content = '

Hello $first_name $last_name,

You (or someone pretending to be you) requested a password reset of your account.

If you access the following link your password will be changed to: $newPassword

$newPasswordLink

'

changeSet.id: #14081 delete permission type under user switching
changeSet.author: Vivek Yadav
changeSet.comment: Remove the permissions 110(Switch to sub-account) from all roles. Delete permission 110 and 111(Switch to any user, Switch to sub-account) permanently as it does not play any role in user switching. Delete User Switching permission type permanently, it don't has any permission.
changeSet.sql: delete from permission_role_map WHERE permission_id=110
delete from international_description WHERE table_id = 59 and foreign_id in(110, 111)
delete from permission WHERE id in (110, 111)
delete from permission_type WHERE id = 11

column.name: content
column.value: This task will copy all the lines on the orders and invoices to the new invoice, considering the periods involved for each order, but not the fractions of periods. It will not copy the lines that are taxes. The quantity and total of each line will be multiplied by the amount of periods.

column.name: foreign_id
column.valueComputed: (select ptt.id from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name = 'com.sapienter.jbilling.server.pluggableTask.AutoRenewalTask')

changeSet.author: Gerhard Maree
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO meta_field_name (id, entity_id, name, optlock, entity_type, data_type, is_disabled, is_mandatory, display_order, is_primary) SELECT coalesce( (select max(id)+1 from meta_field_name),1)+e.id, e.id, 'Minimum Month for Commissions', 1, 'COMPANY', 'DECIMAL', false, false, 5, true FROM entity e;

Hello $first_name $last_name,

Welcome to JBilling!.

Please follow this link to set your credentials:

$newPasswordLink

changeSet.id: JBIIE-339 - Division filter should be multi-select
changeSet.author: Cristian Ebbens
changeSet.sql: UPDATE report_parameter rp SET name = 'divisions', dtype = 'list' FROM report r WHERE rp.name = 'division' AND r.id = rp.report_id AND r.name IN ('accounts_receivable_ageing_detail', 'accounts_receivable_ageing_summary')
